briefDescription: Centre of Excellence in Data Science (CoE-DS) at CSE Department, Institute of Technology, Nirma University is organizing a 2nd national level online Hackathon (MINeD) during March 3-5, 2022 in collaboration with SUNY Binghamton University, USA. This flagship event attracts UG and PG student participants from across India. Various tracks are sponsored by HOPS HEALTHCARE, Cactus Communications and J k Lakshmi, which will offer a real life challenging problem definitions, prizes and mentorship. The grand prize of $1000 is sponsored by Binghamton University which will be distributed among top 3 winning teams.

info.p: Hackathon registered student can login to their hackathon dashboard. If participant forgot password then he/she can change password as instructions per sended to their email
Candidate can change him/her personal data.
My team: Here participant can either create own team Or join any created team Or Auto team assignment by there interested problem statement.
Public teams: participant can see all public and can send join request to team captain
Search: participant can search friends team can send join request to team captain.
Change password: Change password from your old password to new one.
